entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
